current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the United States International Trade
		  Commission to recommend temporary duty suspensions and reductions to Congress,
		  and for other purposes.

header.#text:
Reports on
			 benefits of duty suspensions or reductions to sectors of the United States
			 economy

text.#text:
makes recommendations with respect to
			 sectors of the United States economy that could benefit from duty suspensions
			 or reductions without causing harm to other domestic interests; and

assesses the
			 feasibility and advisability of suspending or reducing duties on a sectoral
			 basis rather than on individual articles.
